description: Detects the creation of screensaver files (.scr) outside of system folders. Attackers may execute an application as an ".SCR" file using "rundll32.exe desk.cpl,InstallScreenSaver" for example.
author: Christopher Peacock @securepeacock
SCYTHE @scythe_io
false_positives: The installation of new screen savers by third party software
name: SCR File Write Event
query: (event.category:file AND file.path:/.*\.[Ss][Cc][Rr]/ AND (NOT file.path:(/.*\:\\\$[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\.\~[Bb][Tt]\\[Nn][Ee][Ww][Oo][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Ww][Oo][Ww]64\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ss][Xx][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\[Ww][Uu][Dd][Oo][Ww][Nn][Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd][Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee]\\.*/)))
